segmentosSRT.text:
Why don't you have a go?
Show them what it takes.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: It's all in order, I'll be going.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui, don't think badly of me...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: for leaving you homeless.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: But I sure like that mansion of yours.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: See you there in a few days.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui, I'm sorry...
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
but you've nothing left.
What would you wager?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: If you're unhappy, talk to Mr. Xie.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Until you're set up elsewhere.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Master Fugui! It's been a year at least.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: This old home of yours is great.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Warm in winter, cool in summer.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Great at any price.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: I've given up the puppet troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Have a seat.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
I don't gamble anymore.
Don't want to end up like you.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: I'm not one to lend money.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: I'll lend you something else. More practical.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text:
I never had to beg
when I ran the puppet troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Earn your money yourself.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Put together a troupe.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: It's your daddy.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: What are you doing?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Where's mommy?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Enough?
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Still not enough? Okay, I'll fill it right up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Big ambition for a little kid.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: It's more than enough.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: So gobble away. Help yourself to sauces.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: Youqing, I'll help you stir that up.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: What a big appetite!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: And so much chili sauce!
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19

segmentosSRT.text: I wouldn't dare.
segmentosSRT.speaker: SPEAKER_19
